__e: He was never going to fit in, what with all the caring about the environment and that.
Big deal. Sounds like you're a little depressed. Of course I'm depressed.
I don't like the people or the environment, and it's not gonna change because they don't think there's anything wrong.
If you're not being run by us, you're being run by someone else... That means you're bringing some undesirable elements into Mr. Costello's area.
I tried to talk to him, he stopped the car, and accused me of manipulating the environment. Of making him see things that weren't there.
It's hard to know what the hell is good for the environment these days.
